info.name: What's in the Bag of Holding? Contest Winners

element.name: What's in the Bag of Holding? Contest Winners

description.p: To celebrate the launch of Stranger Things: Welcome to the Hellfire Club, we invited players to create their own magic items using the D&D Beyond Homebrew tool. You delivered.
From riff-ready gear to the collar of a very good dog, these winners stood out for creativity, clear effects, and on-theme 80s energy.

element.name: Sweatbands of Strumming
element.source: What's in the Bag of Holding? Contest Winners

description.p: While wearing this item, you gain the following benefits:
You gain proficiency with lutes and guitars.
Magically learn how to play 1d4+3 songs, determined when creating this item.

element.name: Shirt of the Defiant
element.source: What's in the Bag of Holding? Contest Winners

description.p: This faded black cotton shirt bears the logo of a forgotten club: a horned fiend ready for battle. The garment grants the wearer advantage on saving throws against becoming frightened.

element.name: Devil Horn Rings
element.source: What's in the Bag of Holding? Contest Winners

description.p: A pair of rings made from a devil's horns, which can be used to bolster allies and terrify foes. Activated by the wearer pressing their thumb against closed middle and ring fingers, with index and pinkie fingers pointed up as antennae. NOTE: Sticking tongue out is entirely optional.

element.name: Flip-Up Shades
element.source: What's in the Bag of Holding? Contest Winners

description.p: This eyeglass frame contains shaded lenses that can be flipped up or down to cover the wearer’s eyes. While the lenses are down the wearer has Advantage on Perception checks while in bright light but Disadvantage in dim light and darkness, and also can’t be Blinded due to light.

element.name: Collar of the Goodest Boy
element.source: What's in the Bag of Holding? Contest Winners

description.p: Yell the command phrase "TREATS" to summon Tyr the Pyr. Tyr the Pyrenees is the large, fluffy, and white ardent defender of his friends, the small, and the helpless. This goodest of good boys is as ready to hand bad guys their own behind, as he is to snuggle.

set.name: attunement
set.addition: by summoning Tyr the Pyr and spending 1 hour petting him
